div.div: Stay in touch with Washington CSD by downloading our new mobile app! Download on your mobile device today and select yes to receive push notifications with the latest news and updates from Washington Community Schools.tay in touch with Washington CSD by downloading our new mobile app! Download on your mobile device today and select yes to receive push notifications with the latest news and updates from the DistrictDownload Today!
div.a: Read More About WCSD Mobile App Now Available

div.div: We served over 650 kids last time. This is a fantastic thing for the kids in our community. Here is a link to our next meal request survey. This survey will be for meals on 4/20 & 4/21. Please take the time to fill it out and share the survey with people if you know children need food. We drop off to multiple sites (map), and we will deliver to our rural community students. You can also access the survey through the district website. We only serve meals on Mondays and Wednesdays. Thank you to all of our staff who are providing meals through this time of need!
Please see this article for information about Internet access options from local providers and the Washington Community School District.
div.a: Read More About Internet Options for Distance Learning
